name: Imam Mahdi Ali Ang Attuko
title: Full Stack Developer
description: Passionate about creating beautiful, functional, and user-centered digital experiences. Currently seeking internship opportunities to grow and contribute.

about.intro: I'm a driven computer science student currently pursing my Diploma in Computer Science at Tunku Abdul Rahman University of Management and Technology with a proven record of academic excellence 3.9117 CGPA. Skilled in multiple programming languages and frameworks, including Java, Kotlin, C++ and Python, with hands-on experience in database management with MySql and version control with Git
about.interests: My greatest passion outside of core development lies in Artificial Intelligence. I constantly track the latest AI news and tools, and I love developing software solutions aimed at solving real-world problems
about.goal: Seeking a challenging internship position from January 12, 2026, to May 31, 2026. My primary goal is to contribute my existing technical knowledge to team projects while gaining hands-on experience and further developing my professional skills.
